meanings.definition: The quality or state of being everlasting.
meanings.sent1: The everlastingness of the mountains filled her with awe.
meanings.sent2: The everlastingness of the stars in the sky is a comforting thought.
meanings.sent3: The everlastingness of the ice cream cone made him eat it slowly.
meanings.sent4: Her love for him felt like the everlastingness of a diamond.
meanings.sent5: The everlastingness of the ocean's waves was mesmerizing.

meanings.definition: The attribute of being eternal or lasting forever.
meanings.sent1: The belief in everlastingness brings hope to many.
meanings.sent2: The everlastingness of friendship is a precious gift.
meanings.sent3: The everlastingness of the battery life surprised him.
meanings.sent4: His dedication to his work showed an everlastingness of commitment.
meanings.sent5: The everlastingness of the oak tree's roots symbolized strength.
